briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Effect of Vitamin D on PFS in Indolent Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
officialTitle: ILyAD (Indolent Lymphoma And Vitamin D) A Phase III Double Blind, Randomized Trial to Evaluate the Effect of Vitamin D on Progression-free Survival in Patients With Low Tumor-burden Indolent Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma Treated With Rituximab
summary: Despite strong evidence suggesting that vitamin D deficiency is associated with undesirable outcomes in patients with numerous cancers, there has never been a thorough study of vitamin D treatment in subjects undergoing treatment for cancer. The purpose of this study is to evaluate whether modification of vitamin D levels in the blood, through supplementation, can improve outcomes.
